body_html: Thanks for the hints! I also needed to apply the solution in this SO question about libcudart.8.0.dylib not loaded to get to build pip package on Mac OS X El Capitan (CUDA 8.0 & cuDNN 5.1).
body_text: Thanks for the hints! I also needed to apply the solution in this SO question about libcudart.8.0.dylib not loaded to get to build pip package on Mac OS X El Capitan (CUDA 8.0 & cuDNN 5.1).
body: Thanks for the hints! I also needed to apply the solution [in this SO question about libcudart.8.0.dylib not loaded](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39865212/dyld-library-not-loaded-rpath-libcudart-8-0-dylib-while-building-tensorflow) to get to build pip package on Mac OS X El Capitan (CUDA 8.0 & cuDNN 5.1).
